import React ,{useState} from 'react' const Register = () => { const [formData,setFormData]=useState({ name:"", email:"", password:"", password2:"" }) const {name,emai,password,password2}=formData; const handleChange=(e)=>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); if(password!==password2) console.log("password does not match"); console.log(formData); } return (

) } export default Register
